video.title: Life Unexpected
video.synopsis: After years in foster care, teenager Lux tracks down her real parents to authorize her emancipation. But she lands in their joint custody instead.

episodes.synopsis: After spending all of her 15 years bouncing from one foster family to another, Lux has decided it's time to take control of her life.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Cate and Baze are paid a visit by a social worker whose job it is to evaluate both of them and determine if they are fit parents.
episodes.title: Home Inspected

episodes.synopsis: When Baze tells his parents about Lux, they insist on planning a dinner at which they can meet their granddaughter and Cate.
episodes.title: Rent Uncollected

episodes.synopsis: When Lux gets suspended from school, Cate does her best to convince Principal Dugan to give Lux a second chance.
episodes.title: Bong Intercepted

episodes.synopsis: Off to a rocky start at her new school, Lux offers to throw a party in Baze's loft in an effort to impress the high school quarterback, Jones.
episodes.title: Turtle Undefeated

episodes.synopsis: Pressured by radio station management, Cate and Ryan reluctantly agree to let Baze join them on air for what turns into a public therapy session.
episodes.title: Truth Unrevealed

episodes.synopsis: In the midst of feeling like he is being pushed out of Lux's life by Cate and Ryan, Baze wins the chance to compete against Ryan.
episodes.title: Crisis Unaverted

episodes.synopsis: Cate and Ryan are forced to put on a happy face as the hosts of a wedding expo.
episodes.title: Bride Unbridled

episodes.synopsis: Jones asks Lux to be his date for the Winter Formal. Baze finds a condom in Lux's room, and thinks it belongs to Jones.
episodes.title: Formal Reformed

episodes.synopsis: After Lux and Bug are picked up by the police for a curfew violation, Lux's social worker decides it's time to reevaluate custody of Lux.
episodes.title: Family Therapized

episodes.synopsis: Lux is forced to face her complicated feelings for Jones when she sees him kissing another girl at a party.
episodes.title: Storm Weathered

episodes.synopsis: With her wedding on the horizon, Cate decides to take a road trip with Lux to find her father, Gordon, who abandoned her when she was a little girl.
episodes.title: Father Unfigured

episodes.synopsis: With her wedding fast approaching, Cate must confront her true feelings for the two men in her life, Baze and Ryan.
episodes.title: Love Unexpected

episodes.synopsis: Cate and Ryan return from their honeymoom only to discover that major changes have been made at the radio station in their absence.
episodes.title: Ocean Uncharted

episodes.synopsis: When Cate and Baze are summoned to the principal's office at Lux's school, they are shocked to learn that Lux is failing.
episodes.title: Parents Unemployed

episodes.synopsis: Worried she may not pass an important exam that will help her stay in school, Lux contemplates buying the answers to the test.
episodes.title: Criminal Incriminated

episodes.synopsis: In an effort to fix their hostile work relationship, Cate attempts to bond with Ryan's new on-air partner, Kelly.
episodes.title: Team Rebounded

episodes.synopsis: This crossover episode of Life Unexpected brings One Tree Hill characters Haley and Mia to a music festival.
episodes.title: Music Faced

episodes.synopsis: Cate and Ryan go on a staycation to a local hotel to help make up for the fact that they never had a proper honeymoon.
episodes.title: Honeymoon Interrupted

episodes.synopsis: Cate, Baze, Ryan and Math volunteer to be chaperones on Lux's school camping trip.
episodes.title: Camp Grounded

episodes.synopsis: Cate takes Paige out drinking, hoping Paige will reveal more information about the mysterious woman, Julia, from Ryan's past.
episodes.title: Plumber Cracked

episodes.synopsis: Baze and Emma attempt to sign a high-profile client, Candy, who only has eyes for Baze.
episodes.title: Homecoming Crashed

episodes.synopsis: When everyone ends up at Baze's loft for Thanksgiving, it isn't long before a few big secrets are exposed.
episodes.title: Thanks Ungiven

episodes.synopsis: Lux and Tasha are forced to deal with the fallout of their recent actions and the potential outcome could change the course of both their lives.
episodes.title: Stand Taken

episodes.synopsis: Baze considers buying a house and planning a future with Emma, not realizing the secret she is hiding about her romantic past with his father.
episodes.title: Teacher Schooled

episodes.synopsis: The series concludes as Cate and Ryan cope with devastating news, while Lux visits Tasha and shares details of a past relationship with Jones.
episodes.title: Affair Remembered
